Hanabi Tracker version 1.3.3.

Hanabi Tracker is a memory aid used while playing the award-winning cooperative game Hanabi.

Title screen

From the title screen, choose the number of cards and multicolor option for each game.

Multicolor options:

  • None - There is no multicolor clue button nor are there multicolor cards.
  • Distinct color - The multicolor clue button is used to mark cards as multicolored.
  • All colors - There is no multicolor clue button and cards that could possibly be multicolored are marked with an icon in the lower right corner of the card. Once a given card is clued with different colors, that card is marked as multicolor and the icon is removed.

Settings screen

Negative Info is inferred from clues that are given about other cards. For example, if you receive a clue that your first card is red, then your other cards are necessarily not red. This negative information can be hidden or displayed below each card.

Cards Shift Direction controls to which end new cards are added and the direction the other cards shift when a card is removed.

Play screen

There are two ways to mark cards with clues: 1) Tap one or more cards and then tap a clue, or 2) tap a clue and then tap one or more cards. Using the second option, the clue button will remain highlighted until another clue is selected.

When a card is played or discarded, tap the Remove button above the corresponding card. A new card is automatically added.

The Undo button will rollback clue or remove actions. The Undo button may be used repeatedly to undo multiple actions.

Long-press a card to display the Card Annotation screen (see below).

Card Annotation screen

The Card Annotation screen allows you to update the positive or negative clue information for a card. Unlike entering normal clues, annotating card information will not affect the negative information of the other cards. This option is useful when displaying negative info and you deduce information about a card without receiving a clue. You may also set the negative information as you eliminate possibilities for a card. Note that in "All colors" multicolor mode, you can toggle the multicolor indicator icon on and off by setting the multicolor state to unknown and no.

Contact

You can report bugs and request enhancements at hanabitracker@gmail.com. If you find this app useful, please rate it on Google Play.
